name: react-virtualized-sectionlist
description: React SectionList component based in react-virtualized List
author: lucasferreira

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:commonjs: npm run clean:commonjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel source --out-dir dist/commonjs --ignore *.example.js,*.test.js,source/demo/,source/tests.js
scripts.build:es: npm run clean:es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel source --out-dir dist/es --ignore *.example.js,*.test.js,source/demo/,source/tests.js
scripts.build:umd: npm run clean:umd && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=umd babel source --out-dir dist/umd --ignore *.example.js,*.test.js,source/demo/,source/tests.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean:commonjs && npm run clean:es && npm run clean:umd
